name: Black Label Trading Co. - Super Deluxe - Robusto
brand: Black Label Trading Co., Super Deluxe
additionalNotes: Of all the blends to come from the famous Black Label Trading Company, Black Label Trading Co. Super Deluxe handmade premium cigars may very well be the best in the portfolio. Super Deluxe cigars intend to capture a wide variety of top-rated flavors from other BLTC blends and combine them into a single ‘deluxe’ profile, and dare I say they accomplished this feat with flying colors. These smokes are made with extensively aged Nicaraguan long filler tobaccos that are tightly packed inside a spicy Ecuadorian Habano binder and completed by a top-quality San Andres Mexican wrapper that has a shimmering oily surface. The smoke that I get upon lighting is full-bodied, loaded with rich notes of dark chocolate, sweet cream, and hints of pepper that engage the palate yet are never overwhelming, providing a top-notch smoking experience that fellow seasoned smokers are guaranteed to enjoy.
